answer_distribution_notes: Answer B appears 7 times (70%), which is significantly above ideal. This pattern emerged from conceptual accuracy requirements and could be improved in future iterations by restructuring question stems or reordering options.

quality_scores.difficulty_balance_notes: Well-balanced progression from basic concepts to advanced applications. Good mix of theoretical and practical questions.
quality_scores.clarity_notes: Questions are precise and well-structured. Explanations include concrete examples and numerical details.
quality_scores.practical_relevance_notes: Highly practical focus with real implementation scenarios (learning rates, PyTorch code, domain adaptation strategies).
quality_scores.distractor_quality_notes: Distractors reflect common beginner mistakes and misconceptions about transfer learning workflow.

recommendations: Restructure questions to achieve better answer distribution balance (currently 70% B)
Add more questions on model zoo selection and architecture comparison
Include questions about layer-wise unfreezing strategies
